RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHANNEL FURY never far back, rallied three wide through the turn and into the stretch, made the lead before the furlong marker and drew clear under right handed urging. AYE AYE SIR broke sharply, set a rapid pace along the inside for a half, steadied entering the stretch, altered course to the five path giving up ground then came on again late. SO DIALED IN settled outside and closed some ground late. LIBERATE pressed the pace two wide, dropped inside at the top of the stretch and was outfinished. BEER CHASER failed to menace. SHY GUY was no factor. ITASCA had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Beer Chaser
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Aye Aye Sir
ENTRY.COMMENT: set fast pace inside, steadied 3/16pole, altered 5p, came again

ENTRY.NAME: Channel Fury
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied 3 wide, drew off, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Itasca
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Shy Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: So Dialed In
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside, late gain,

ENTRY.NAME: Liberate
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC Lewis Michael and S G M Thoroughbred Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished inside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Sin ce March 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PROSPECTIVE FORUM sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set all the pace and drew off through deep stretch under right handed urging. BLUSHING BETTY saved ground and finished second best. DIVINE MARTHA pressured the winner two wide into the stretch and was outfinished. RENO TOUCH stumbled badly at the start, was forwardly placed between horses two wide then lacked the needed response. SIERRA DIAMOND close up four wide, faded in the stretch. CEVICHE trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Prospective Forum
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, drew off, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Blushing Betty
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Reno Touch
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled badly start, close up, between horses, lacked response

ENTRY.NAME: Ceviche
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Martha
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Sierra Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 4 wide, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 40100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 30 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Fo r $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: J J'S FANCY trailed into the stretch, swung wide, circled her field in the middle of the racetrack and got up in the final strides. NICEASAKITTENSEYES unhurried inside, altered course to the seven path entering the stretch, rallied to be on even terms for the lead in the final stages and just missed. THE DEVIL'S DREAM dueled for the early lead along the inside, shook clear on the turn, drifted to the six path entering the stretch, maintained her advantage inside the sixteenth pole and was outfinished. MOBIL CHIC dueled for the lead two wide into the turn and gave way in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Niceasakittenseyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried inside, altered course 7path, dug in, just missed

ENTRY.NAME: J J's Fancy
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, circled field mid track, up in final strides

ENTRY.NAME: The Devil's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, shook clear turn, drifted 6path, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Mobil Chic
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide turn, gave way lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Claiming Purse 13100. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KISS IT GOODBYE prompted the pace two wide into the stretch, made the lead when put to a right handed whip then drew off through the final stages under a strong hand ride. SAUNTER was bumped at the start, trailed early, rallied three wide and finished second best. KRISTIN rushed to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace along the inside past the quarter pole then was outfinished. CAJUN HEIR well placed, failed to respond. SWAMP WITCH HADDY bore out at the start bumping SAUNTER then failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Heir
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Kristin
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Kiss It Goodbye
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, full of run, going away, hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: Swamp Witch Haddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Saunter
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, rallied 3 wide, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 30 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weig ht Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MR. BOUMA pressed the early pace three wide, made the lead entering the turn, shook clear in the four path in upper stretch and prevailed under right handed urging. AGNELLO'S DREAM never far back, had a mild late rally in the six path and got up for second. GUN LAP had speed from the start four wide, loomed boldly into the turn then was outfinished in a game effort. CENTSOFWANDER failed to menace. CHROMED IMPULSE battled for the lead two wide into the turn then weakened. UNCLEJACKOMO dueled for the early lead along the rail, checked entering the turn and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Agnello's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally 6path, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Centsofwander
ENTRY.OWNER: Fisher Teresa K and Fisher James
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Unclejackomo
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, checked 3/8 pole, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Chromed Impulse
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Bouma
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3 wide, assumed command, shook clear, lasted

ENTRY.NAME: Gun Lap
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 4 wide, loomed boldly turn, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since March 30 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOURBONWITHGINGER broke in full stride to set all the pace, widened under right handed urging and won as much the best. MISS BETTY hit the gate then bore in at the start, rushed to contention three wide into the turn, angled inside in upper stretch and was no match for the winner while clear for second. MEET THE BEAUTY with the second flight inside, altered course to the six path entering the stretch and improved position. LEWD well placed, went evenly. MITESSE pressed the early pace along the rail then weakened. DOMITIA LUCILLA trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Domitia Lucilla
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Meet the Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight inside, altered course 6path, improved position,

ENTRY.NAME: Mitesse
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbonwithginger
ENTRY.OWNER: Tooley Jennifer Dolce Vita Farm and Beckett Racing Team
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace, drew off, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Lewd
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Betty
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate, bore in start, rushed 3 wide, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 30 Allowed 2 lbs. ; A Race Since Mar ch 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Maiden, Claiming, Starter, Optional, or Ohio Bred. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANDLELIGHT HOURS chased the pace through the turn, surged to the front two wide entering the stretch then widened at will the balance of the trip to win as much the best while in hand late. KICHI KITSU sprinted to a daylight lead soon after the start, set a rapid pace along the inside to the top of the stretch then was no match for the winner while well clear for second. SENORA PANQUEQUES went evenly. INDY PRINCESS KOKO failed to menace. FLOWZANO reared at the start and was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Kichi Kitsu
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set fast pace, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Candlelight Hours
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, surged 2 wide, much the best, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: Flowzano
ENTRY.COMMENT: reared start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Indy Princess Koko
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Senora Panqueques
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 14000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since March 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registe red Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEE SPOT RUN stalked the pace three wide, rallied to make the lead at the top of the stretch then finished full of run in the six path to win going away. MR CLINE pressed the pace along the rail and dug in gamely to gain second. KHOPILOT stalked the pace into the stretch and finished well three wide. EL SICARIO away alertly, set the pace two wide for six furlongs then was outfinished. K P SILVER BULLET failed to menace. GRAND DEAL was no factor. HAD RIGHT trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Cline
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, gamely second best,

ENTRY.NAME: K P Silver Bullet
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: See Spot Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, full of run, going away 6path

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Wayne Hash, Travis Hash & Traci McCord

ENTRY.NAME: Khopilot
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, finished well, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Had Right
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: El Sicario
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 1/4 pole, outfinished
